Fun game, played many a hours. One large glaring issue is the matchmaking is absolute garbage. Many games you queue solo and get placed against a group of 4 to 5 friends which automatically puts you at a disadvantage. Sometimes you get placed against people MANY ranks above you, as a hardstuck silver ive faced ranks so far above me i dont even know what they are called. Its actually impossible to rank up, you could win 10 in a row and not budge, but as soon as you lose one its derank. They keep your "elo" hidden so you really have no clue if you are actually making progress besides the useless rank they decide to give you. Its really a shame that you  have to use third party programs to get a decent matchmaking experience. Other than that i cant say the game isnt fun, but as a competitive player its really hard to find a satisfying match that feels like every player is on an equal skill level.

Pros:

Skill pays off

Not pay to win

Very refined game in general


Cons:

Permanent PTSD

Verbal assault (in russian), is a general part of the community

Lack of skill will chastise you 

Matchmaking can be unbalanced

Outdated graphics and animations

Can cause explosive anger, which can damage desk, floor, ceiling and nearby people.


Overall a good player experience. 9/10
